posts.title: Summer Training Plan
posts.summary: Outline of off-season strength and skills training.
posts.content:
# Summer Training Plan

Focus areas:

1. Strength and conditioning 3x weekly
2. Infield footwork and transfers
3. Hitting sessions (tee + front toss + machine)

Target measurables:

- Exit Velo: +3–5 mph
- Throw Velo: +2–3 mph
- Home to 1st: -0.05–0.1s
